SA14n1154:16: naiḥsvābhāvyena rūpaṃ nityānityaviyogānna nityaṃ nānityamityākāraḥ prathamaḥ |
SA14n1154:26: ātmānātmasvabhāvābhāvānnotpannaṃ na niruddhaṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadātamevaṃ viśuddhamiti caturthaḥ |
SA14n1154:50: prajñāpāramitayā devaputrāṇāmanupakārāttāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya rakṣādikaraṇe teṣāṃ ko heturiti |
SA14n1154:58: pyanuttararatidānādapi tato dharmabhāṇakatvena hetunā buddhatvaprāpterhetubhūtaṃ nidānaṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatītyarthaḥ |
SA14n1154:75: paratantraṃ na saṃśliṣyate pariniṣpannaṃ na parigṛhṇātītyarthabhedaḥ |
SA14n1154:79: pi dharmāṇāṃ kathanaṃ na parigraha iti |
SA14n1154:85: nairyāṇikānairyāṇikavikalatvenobhaye vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇe jñeye śabde jñānasyānutpattirityākāraḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ |
SA14n1154:102: iti vistareṇa nirdiśyaivaṃ sakalārthasaṅgrahakatvena trisarvajñatāmadhye sarvākārajñatāmupasaṃharannāha |
SA14n1154:106: sandarśikā sannāhapratipattyā sāmānyarūpeṇa nidarśikā prasthānapratipattyā viśeṣarūpeṇa |
SA14n1154:107: āvāhikā sambhārapratipattyā prāpikā nirvāhikā niryāṇapratipattyā niṣkarṣikā |
SA14n1154:145: iyaṃ seti sarvajñatā sarvadharmadeśanetyārabhya yāvaddakṣiṇīyaḥ kṛta iti |
SA14n1154:149: iti seyaṃ punaḥ seyaṃ seyaṃ khalu punastridhā |
SA14n1154:151: iti | kimarthaṃ punastathā sarvajñatāyāṃ pṛthagbhāvanāmārgo nāsti yathā mārgajñatāyāmabhihitaḥ |
SA14n1154:152: śrāvakapratyekabuddhasampadaṃ bodhisattvo jñānena darśanena cāvalokyātikrāmatīti vacanenāsākṣātkartavyatvānnirdiṣṭo bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ tu yathā paridṛṣṭa evārthaḥ punaḥ punarabhimukhīkriyamāṇo bhāvanāmārga iti sugamatvānnoktaḥ |
SA14n1154:154: śrāvakādīnāṃ tvanityādibhirevākārairākīryamāṇe satyacatuṣṭaye sāsravaṃ bhāvanāmayamūṣmādikaṃ spaṣṭatvānnoktamiti grāhyam |
SA14n1154:155: nanu mārgajñatāyāṃ śrāvakādimārgasyābhidhānāt sarvajñatā kathitaiva kasmāt punaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ pṛthaṅnirdeśa iti cet |
SA14n1154:162: parijñātatrisarvajñato vaśitvārthaṃ punaḥ sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṅgraheṇa trisarvajñatāṃ bhāvayatīti sarvākārābhisambodho vaktavyaḥ |
SA14n1154:163: tatra tāvannityādigrāhavipakṣasya pratipakṣadharmatā svabhāvānāmanityādyālambanaprakārāṇāmākāratvena vyavasthānaṃ sāmānyena lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyamato nirvastukākāradoṣo neha vijṛmbhate |
SA14n1154:164: te cākārāstrisarvajñatābhedāttriprakārā eva matā iti grāhyam |
SA14n1154:167: sarvajñatānāṃ traividhyāt trividhā eva te matāḥ ||1 || iti
SA14n1154:168: tatra catvāryāryasatyānyadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā trisarvajñatādhikāreṇa yasmin satye yāvanto bhavantyākārāstānuparidīpayan sarvajñatādhikāreṇa tāvadāha |
SA14n1154:186: śarīraṃ rūpaskandhastaṣāmasau heturiti kṛtvā nyāyenānāmāśarīratāmupādāya hetvākārāstattvato'
SA14n1154:238: tadete'saṃkleśāvyavadānānupalepāprapañcāmananācalākārāḥ ṣaḍ yathākramaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānakleśavāsanārūpādiprapañcasvādhigamopalambhaparihāṇivikalpānāṃ ṣaṇāṃ pratiniyatajñeyāvaraṇānāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāḥ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣātmake'
SA14n1154:243: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ ||2 || iti
SA14n1154:246: duḥkhanirodhasatye ca phalamityarthadvāreṇa nirdiṣṭe samudayamārgaduḥkhanirodhasatyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭau sapta pañca ṣoḍaśākārā bodhavyāḥ |
SA14n1154:248: chando rāgo nandī ca paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇeti |
SA14n1154:260: vikale kāraṇe sati kāryānudayo na syāditi nyāyāt |
SA14n1154:266: rāgāvasthāyāṃ sākṣātpravṛttihetutvena chandaḥ pradhānamiti kṛtvā tadabhāvena rāgasyābhāvāpadeśāt |
SA14n1154:284: yathākramaṃ yo hetuḥ chando rāgo nandī ca |
SA14n1154:288: tatpratipakṣeṇa trayastraya eka eka ityaṣṭāvākārāḥ samudayasatye bhavanti |
SA14n1154:311: tadevamapramāṇāntadvayānanugamāsambhinnāparāmṛṣṭāvikalpāprameyāsaṅgākārā yathākramaṃ yaḥ sarvasattvāvakāśado mārgo yathā ca sarvasattvāvakāśadaḥ,
SA14n1154:315: dvau dvau dvāveka iti saptākārā mārgasatye bhavanti |
SA14n1154:327: tadevamanityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārāḥ pañcamālakṣaṇākārasvabhāvā iti pañcākārā duḥkhasatye bhavanti |
SA14n1154:331: tatrādhyātmabahirdhobhayavastūnāṃ nirodhenādhyātmabahirdhobhayaśūnyatākārāstrayo nirodhākārasvabhāvāḥ śūnyatāyāṃ bhājanaloke paramārthe saṃskṛte'
SA14n1154:346: svabhāvanirodhenābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatākāra eva niḥsaraṇākārātmaka iti nirodhākāraṃ śāntākāraṃ praṇītākāraṃ niḥsaraṇākārañcādhikṛtya yaścādhyātmikādervastuno nirodhaḥ |
SA14n1154:352: ṣṭāvekastraya eka iti yathākramaṃ ṣoḍaśākārā nirodhasatye bhavanti |
SA14n1154:355: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodhe ca yathākramam |
SA14n1154:356: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ ||3 || iti
SA14n1154:357: tadanantaraṃ sarvākārajñatākārā vaktavyāḥ tatra ca sarvāryapudgalādhikāreṇa trividhasarvajñatākārasaṅgraho bhavati ataḥ sarvajñatāmārgabhedenāha |
SA14n1154:363: tato'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti sarvathotpannānutpannasyākuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ prahāṇānutpādanārthaṃ bhūyobhāvotpādanārthaṃ ca hetubhūtavīryātmakāḥ samyak prahāṇākārāścatvāro vyavasāyikamārgaḥ,
SA14n1154:368: nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagbhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ,
SA14n1154:370: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca sarvathābhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ,
SA14n1154:378: tadevaṃ vastuparīkṣāmārgādi saptavidhaṃ mārgamadhikṛtya sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti |
SA14n1154:383: yaccānimittaṃ nirodho yena cānimittaṃ vikalpāpoḍhena mārgeṇeti kṛtvā nirodhamārgasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ dvitīyamānimittavimokṣamukhaṃ dṛṣṭinimittavikalpapratipakṣaḥ |
SA14n1154:384: yattūktamānimittaḥ śamākārairiti tadvastunimittānuviddhaṃ śrāvakamārgamadhikṛtyeti na tenāsya virodhaḥ |
SA14n1154:385: anityaduḥkha samudayasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ tṛtīyamapraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣa iti |
SA14n1154:388: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvādyathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpī pratyātmaṃ dhyānamārūpyasamāpattiṃ vā niḥśritya bahirdhā rūpāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇani paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau |
SA14n1154:389: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathāsaṃkhyamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśastatpratipakṣeṇa śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati |
SA14n1154:390: pratyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣvanyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāmanyonyānugamasaṃjñāṃ ca niśrityānyonyaikarasasañjñālābhena yatheṣṭaṃ rūpādhimokṣavibhūtvalābhādityeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāstrayo nirmāṇamārgaḥ |
SA14n1154:391: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārupyasamāpatyākārāḥ śāntavihāramārgasvabhāvaḥ sañjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ |
SA14n1154:400: tatra ca mārgo niratiśayatvādeka eva kevalaṃ tu balavaiśāradyādyākārabhedenāsya viśeṣamārgasyāsādhāraṇabhedo vaktavya ityāha |
SA14n1154:416: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramamadhigamāsvādanajñeyāvaraṇapratighātābhāvena sarvajñānāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ |

SA14n1154:771: tato'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti sarvathotpannānutpannasyākuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ prahāṇānutpādanārthaṃ bhūyobhāvotpādanārthaṃ ca hetubhūtavīryātmakāḥ samyak prahāṇākārāścatvāro vyavasāyikamārgaḥ,
SA14n1154:776: nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagbhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ,
SA14n1154:778: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti tatsvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca sarvathābhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ,
SA14n1154:786: tadevaṃ vastuparīkṣāmārgādi saptavidhaṃ mārgamadhikṛtya sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti |
SA14n1154:791: yaccānimittaṃ nirodho yena cānimittaṃ vikalpāpoḍhena mārgeṇeti kṛtvā nirodhamārgasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ dvitīyamānimittavimokṣamukhaṃ dṛṣṭinimittavikalpapratipakṣaḥ |
SA14n1154:792: yattūktamānimittaḥ śamākārairiti tadvastunimittānuviddhaṃ śrāvakamārgamadhikṛtyeti na tenāsya virodhaḥ |
SA14n1154:793: anityaduḥkha samudayasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ tṛtīyamapraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣa iti |
SA14n1154:796: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvādyathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpī pratyātmaṃ dhyānamārūpyasamāpattiṃ vā niḥśritya bahirdhā rūpāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇani paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau |
SA14n1154:797: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathāsaṃkhyamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśastatpratipakṣeṇa śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati |
SA14n1154:798: pratyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣvanyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāmanyonyānugamasaṃjñāṃ ca niśrityānyonyaikarasasañjñālābhena yatheṣṭaṃ rūpādhimokṣavibhūtvalābhādityeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāstrayo nirmāṇamārgaḥ |
SA14n1154:799: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārupyasamāpatyākārāḥ śāntavihāramārgasvabhāvaḥ sañjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ |
SA14n1154:808: tatra ca mārgo niratiśayatvādeka eva kevalaṃ tu balavaiśāradyādyākārabhedenāsya viśeṣamārgasyāsādhāraṇabhedo vaktavya ityāha |
SA14n1154:824: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramamadhigamāsvādanajñeyāvaraṇapratighātābhāvena sarvajñānāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ |
SA14n1154:829: jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhya nāsti chandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā vimukteśca sakāśātparihāṇīrityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ |
SA14n1154:833: sarvasya dharmasya buddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitasya lakṣaṇārthavaikṛtyādavitathatāmupādāya sarvabuddhabhāṣitatathatākāra ekaḥ |
SA14n1154:839: tadevaṃ kṛtvā yathā balādibhirākārāṇāṃ prabhedo yaścaiṣāṃ svabhāvastathatā |
SA14n1154:840: yasya ca te sarvadharmavaśavartinaḥ svayambhuvo yadarthañca sarvadharmasarvākārābhisambodhāyeti yathākramaṃ daśa catvāraścatvāro'
SA14n1154:841: ṣṭādaśa eka eka ekaścetyekonacatvāriṃśadākārāḥ sarvākārajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānā bhavanti |
SA14n1154:842: yathoktā eva cākārāḥ śrāvakādibhedena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ mārgasatyabhedādavagantavyāḥ |
SA14n1154:850: anāsravā eva sarvākārajñatākārāḥ savāsanakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇena sarvadharmajñānitvāt samyaksambuddhasyetyekatra gaṇyamānaṃ trisaptatyuttaramākāraśatamityākārāḥ |
